system.description: When cast, this spell prevents divination from detecting or locating the creature or object, and renders the subject invisible to any form of sight or seeing (as invisibility). The subject can still be discovered through tactile means or devices. Creatures affected become comatose and are in suspended animation until the spell ends or is dispelled. Attended or magical objects get a Will save to resist being sequestered.

components.materialDescription: A basilisk eyelash, gum arabic, and a dram of whitewash.

system.target: One willing creature or object (up to 2-ft. cube/level) touched
